module.name: IVR
module.description: Creates Digital Receptionist (aka Auto-Attendant, aka Interactive Voice Response) menus. These can be used to send callers to different locations (eg, Press 1 for sales) and/or allow direct-dialing of extension numbers.
module.changelog: *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11148 return on invalid bug *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10862. Fix defaults on add *13.0.12* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.11* FREEPBX-10756 *13.0.10* FREEPBX-9773 *13.0.9* Slideout menu *13.0.8.1* FREEPBX-10348 Fix tooltip on timeout to reflect 0 as disabled *13.0.8* FREEPBX-5470 Increase col from 50 to 200 for other destinations *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10312 Allow announcements to be set as none *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10169, fix action buttons after submit. FREEPBX-10168 Fix use of quotes in name or description *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9774, standardize tables visual updates *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9609 Option to Limit IVR Direct Dialing to a Directory *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha2* Bugfix #9072,#8993, astman connection error catching *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *2.11.0.6* Add license file *2.10.0.0* rewrite! *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #1798, #4655
